description: printed in blue on cream paper, in a fan shape; kneeling figure at right gathering sticks into a bundle; woman at left carrying a bundle of sticks, entering a doorway; dark sky with snow between figures
inscription: LLC in pencil: R 73 | LRC in pencil: L10 / C-831
provenance: Sale, James A. Bakker Antiques Auctions, Provincetown, Mass., to Clemens; (Thomas J. Clemens, Boston, until 2017; sold to Kinney); Marla J. Kinney, Minneapolis (2017-18)
signed: LLC in pencil: Charles Shannon / The Snow, Winter (a Fan)
title: The Snow, Winter (A Fan)
